00125 
00126         struct btConstraintInfo2 {
00127                 // integrator parameters: frames per second (1/stepsize), default error
00128                 // reduction parameter (0..1).
00129                 btScalar fps,erp;
00130 
00131                 // for the first and second body, pointers to two (linear and angular)
00132                 // n*3 jacobian sub matrices, stored by rows. these matrices will have
00133                 // been initialized to 0 on entry. if the second body is zero then the
00134                 // J2xx pointers may be 0.
00135                 btScalar *m_J1linearAxis,*m_J1angularAxis,*m_J2linearAxis,*m_J2angularAxis;
00136 
00137                 // elements to jump from one row to the next in J's
00138                 int rowskip;
00139 
00140                 // right hand sides of the equation J*v = c + cfm * lambda. cfm is the
00141                 // "constraint force mixing" vector. c is set to zero on entry, cfm is
00142                 // set to a constant value (typically very small or zero) value on entry.
00143                 btScalar *m_constraintError,*cfm;
00144 
00145                 // lo and hi limits for variables (set to -/+ infinity on entry).
00146                 btScalar *m_lowerLimit,*m_upperLimit;
00147 
00148                 // number of solver iterations
00149                 int m_numIterations;
00150 
00151                 //damping of the velocity
00152                 btScalar        m_damping;
00153         };
00154

00339 // returns angle in range [-SIMD_2_PI, SIMD_2_PI], closest to one of the limits 
00340 // all arguments should be normalized angles (i.e. in range [-SIMD_PI, SIMD_PI])
00341 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE btScalar btAdjustAngleToLimits(btScalar angleInRadians, btScalar angleLowerLimitInRadians, btScalar angleUpperLimitInRadians)
00342 {
00343         if(angleLowerLimitInRadians >= angleUpperLimitInRadians)
00344         {
00345                 return angleInRadians;
00346         }
00347         else if(angleInRadians < angleLowerLimitInRadians)
00348         {
00349                 btScalar diffLo = btFabs(btNormalizeAngle(angleLowerLimitInRadians - angleInRadians));
00350                 btScalar diffHi = btFabs(btNormalizeAngle(angleUpperLimitInRadians - angleInRadians));
00351                 return (diffLo < diffHi) ? angleInRadians : (angleInRadians + SIMD_2_PI);
00352         }
00353         else if(angleInRadians > angleUpperLimitInRadians)
00354         {
00355                 btScalar diffHi = btFabs(btNormalizeAngle(angleInRadians - angleUpperLimitInRadians));
00356                 btScalar diffLo = btFabs(btNormalizeAngle(angleInRadians - angleLowerLimitInRadians));
00357                 return (diffLo < diffHi) ? (angleInRadians - SIMD_2_PI) : angleInRadians;
00358         }
00359         else
00360         {
00361                 return angleInRadians;
00362         }
00363 }
